title: Lending service providers may have to provide digital view of all offers: RBI
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) is considering new rules for digital lending, aiming to enhance transparency. The proposed guidelines would require lending service providers (LSPs) to digitally share all available loan offers from willing lenders with borrowers. This move aims to empower borrowers by providing a clear view of their loan options, including details like lender names, loan amounts, interest rates, and key terms. The RBI also emphasizes the need for unbiased content, prohibiting LSPs from favoring any particular lender.
